Welcome to kalabash-radicale's documentation!
============================================

This `Kalabash <https://alphamonak.com/>`_ extension provides a simple
management frontend for `Radicale <http://radicale.org/>`_, a complete
CalDAV (calendar) and CardDAV (contact) server solution.

Features currently supported are:

* Private calendar creation (available for simple users)
* Rights management for private calendars
* Shared calendar creation by domain (available for domain administrators)
* User and shared calendars display
* Events creation/update/delete/view
